chapter.title: FAQ
chapter.para: For more information on JBoss Developer Studio features, refer to the following FAQ to get the answers on the most "popular" questions.

section.title: How to get Code Assist for Seam specific resources in an externally generated project?
section.para: To get Code Assist for Seam specific resources in an externally generated project, you should enable Seam features in Project Preferences. Right click an imported project and navigate Properties > Seam Settings. Check Seam support box to enable all available Seam Settings.

section.title: How to import an example Seam project from jboss-eap directory?
section.para: To import an example Seam project from jboss-eap into your working directory, you should perform the following steps:

listitem.para: Go to New > Other > Java Project from Existing Buildfile
Point to the build.xml of any chosen project by pressing Browse button
Hit Finish to open the project

section.para: As these seam examples are non WTP projects, next you should enable Seam support for them. To do that, right click the project and go to Properties > Seam Settings.
